survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Green Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on workplace sustainability initiatives to understand their impact and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current green initiatives?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current green initiatives?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following workplace green initiatives are you aware of? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following workplace green initiatives are you aware of? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's current green initiatives?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected at least one initiative in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.
